description: Swarm A vector (VFM) and scalar (ASM) magnetic field measurements interpolated at 1Hz rate.
terms: This dataset is provided by the European Space Agency and it is subject to terms condition described in https://vires.services/data_terms.

vires:parameters.name: F
vires:parameters.description: scalar B-field in FGM-1 sensor system

vires:parameters.name: Flags_Position
vires:parameters.description: status informations for positions; column 1 - number of gaps in interpolation interval; column 2 - flag for PDO used instead of RSO; column 3 - number of basePoints used for interpolation

vires:parameters.name: Flags_B

flags: Set when ASM instrument is turned off.
Set for outlier detected, gap, or not enough VFM temperature data for filtering.
Set for more than 5 suspiciuos VFM samples in 2 seconds surrounding record time.
Set for discrepancy between ASM and VFM measurements.
Set for in VFM samples in surrounding 2 seconds.
Set for not enough VFM samples to generate B_VFM and B_NEC.

vires:parameters.description: FGM Quality information; ### bits of byte 1 (8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1) ### 1 - adc (first sample anormal (1) or not (0)), ### 3,2 sample frequency, ### (00 - sample freq is  50 Hz, ### 01 - sample freq is  10 Hz, ### 10 - sample freq is   1 Hz, ### 11 - sample freq is  illegal), ### 4 - torquer overlap flag (ok (0), no torquer overlap (1)), ### 5 - redundant flag, ### 6 - bad average distribution (ok (0), bad (1)), ### 7 - ovm frequenzy correction flag (), ### 8 - ovm not hk overlaped flag (ok (0), no overlap (1)), ### bits of byte 2 (8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1) ### 1 - L3 ovm interpolated flag (no (0), interpolated (1)), ### 2 - L3 fgm interpolated flag (no (0), interpolated (1)), ### 3 - L3 delta interpolated flag (no (0), interpolated (1)), ### 4 - L3 value not corrected (ok (0), no correction (1)), ### 5 - empty, ### 6 - FGM Burst mode (compression on (1), off (0)), ### 7 - L2 ovm gps error corrected (no (0), corrected (1)), ### 8 - L2 fgm gps error corrected (no (0), corrected (1))

vires:parameters.name: Flags_q
vires:parameters.description: star camera quality information 1st digit mode = 0: no data, ### 1st digit mode = 1: not available, ### 1st digit mode = 2: single data boom, chu2cr static, ### 1st digit mode = 3: not available, ### 1st digit mode = 4: not available, ### 1st digit mode = 5: not available, ### 1st digit mode = 6: single data boom + chu2cr dynamic, ### 1st digit mode = 7: dual data boom, ### 2nd digit filtered (0: no, 1: yes), ### 3rd digit chu2cr (0: static, 1: dynamic, 2: dual), ### 4th digit jump correction (0: no, 1: chu1/3, 2: chu2/4, 3: chu1/3 and chu2/4), ### 5th digit gaps interpolated (0: no, 1: chu1/3, 2: chu2/4, 3: chu1/3 and chu2/4)

vires:parameters.name: Mode_q
vires:parameters.description: star camera mode (from left to right): 1st A1 Camera 1 Boom; 2nd A2 Camera 2 Boom; 3rd B1 Camera 1 Body; 4rd B2 Camera 2 Body

vires:parameters.name: q_ICRF_CRF
vires:parameters.description: ASC quaternions for ICRF -> CRF transformation

vires:parameters.name: F_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: scalar B-field in FGM-1 sensor system, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: B-vector in NEC system, CHAOS magnetic model residual

title: CH_ME_MAG_LR_3
